title: Welcome Template
message: {FIRSTNAME}, and welcome to {COMPANY}! Room {ROOM} is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay and let us know if you need anything.

title: Room Cleaning Template
message: {FIRSTNAME}! Your room {ROOM} is currently being cleaned. We will message you again when it is ready. Thank you for your patience and thank you for choosing {COMPANY} in {CITY}!

title: Issue Template
message: {FIRSTNAME}. Thank you for letting us know of the issue. We will send someone to you shortly.

title: Exit Template
message: {FIRSTNAME}! Thank you for staying with us at {COMPANY}. We hope you had a pleasant time and look forward to having you again!

title: Bad Weather Template
message: this is a message to inform all guests of the inclement weather currently. Please use caution if you are going out. Thank you and have a great night!

title: Test All
message: First name: {FIRSTNAME}, Last name: {LASTNAME}, Full name: {FIRSTNAME} {LASTNAME}, Room number: {ROOM}, Company: {COMPANY}, City: {CITY}. Timezone: {TIMEZONE}
